nodes.description: Making a bucket list is a great way to create more amazing memories.

thumbnail.alternativeText: 35 Bucket List Ideas for Best Friends

nodes.title: There are 35 bucket list ideas for the best friends

data.body:
## There are some fun bucket list ideas for friends

 Some of the best memories are made with our friends. There's something special about the bond between besties, whether it's laughing until you can't breathe, going on wild adventures, or staying up all night talking. Making a bucket list together is a great way to create more amazing memories.

### You can go on a road trip

If you want to bond with your bestie, you should pack up the car and hit the open road.

### You can go camping

 If you want to get back to nature, pitch a tent, build a fire and enjoy the outdoors. All of the memories should be captured with your camera.

data.body:
### You can attend a music festival

 There is nothing like listening to live music with a friend. You can go to your favorite music festival and dance the day away with some tickets.

### Matching tattoos can be obtained

Matching tattoos are a permanent reminder that you will always be there for your friend.

### Skydiving is something to do

skydiving is not for the faint hearted, but it is an experience that you will never forget.

data.body:
### You should go on a cruise

 A cruise is a great way to explore new places with your best friend. For a fun photo op, you can get matching outfits.

### You can go to a rodeo

A rodeo is a great place to learn about a different culture and see some amazing stunts.

### You can go to the winery

 Take a trip to a local winery to sample some of the best wines in the area. It's a great way to spend an afternoon, and you can find a new favorite wine.

data.body:
### Stargazing is something to do

 It's a good idea to go out to a dark location and look at the stars. If you want to take a break and relax, this is a great activity to do.

### You can get makeovers

Treat yourself to a day at the salon and get new hair, makeup, and clothes.

### You can go shopping

 If you want to spend time with your best friend, hit the stores and find some new clothes. Oxford Street in London is a famous shopping street.

data.body:
### You should have a picnic

 Enjoy a leisurely picnic with your bestie and get away from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. Don't forget to bring drinks and snacks.

### You should go to a carnival

You can win prizes at the carnival if you eat cotton candy, ride the rides and do other activities.

### You can go horseback riding

You can try horseback riding with your best friend, and it is a lot of fun.

data.body:
### There is a fun day out in a famous city

You can see the sights, eat the food, and have fun in a famous city.

### You can go to the museum

 You can learn a lot about different cultures and history by visiting a museum. It is fun to look at all of the different exhibits.

### You can go see your favorite band or musician

It's a great way to spend time with your friends and enjoy some great music.

data.body:

 Take some time to relax at a spa day. It's a great way to treat yourself and your friend.

### You can volunteer together

 You can give back to your community by volunteering. You can help out at a soup kitchen or animal shelter.

### Go for a cheese tasting

You can sample cheese at a local shop and find a new favorite.

data.body:
### Kayaking is a sport

 A great way to spend time together is kayaking on the water. Life jackets and sunscreen are a must.

### Quad biking is a sport

A great activity to do with your best friend is riding on four-wheeled ATVs.

### You can go to the arcade

A great way to spend time together is to play some classic arcade games and win prizes.

data.body:
### You can try out Axe Throwing

Throwing axes at a target is a fun way to let out some aggression.

### You can try out some archery

A great way to spend time together is to shoot arrows at a target.

### Rock climbing is a sport

It is a great activity to do with your best friend and it is sure to be a blast.

## The bottom line is what it is

There are a lot of things to consider when working out your bucket list.

If one of you actually wants to do the task and the other doesn't, it's ok.

 It needs to be realistic but not boring. It needs to be memorable at the end of the day, but going into space may be a bit extreme.

 Enjoy it, it's finally here. At the end of the day, a life with a plan could be one that leads you to do things you wouldn't have otherwise done, and there's no one better to do it with than your friend.

The content is accurate and true to the best of the author's knowledge, but is not meant to be a substitute for formal and individualized advice from a qualified professional.
